1.content: Which girl will you be in a relationship with?
1.title: Choose your girl!

choices: Mizore Has a new Target to Stalk!
Mizore Starts Being Rather Creepy Right There...
Moka, Kurumu, Tsukune and Yukari Arrive...Uh oh...
11.content:
Your name was Dwayne Ambrosine, you were a 'monster' or at least half monster attending Yokai Academy. You were a tan skinned teenager with ginger hair braided on one side. You spoke with a Louisiana accent, it was somewhat mocked by the 'tough guys' of the school who said you sounded like you came out of a swamp.

They weren't exactly wrong, your family had been in Louisiana a long time.

And that meant a LOOOOOOONG time. You were directly descended from the famous Voodoo Priestess Marie Levaeu. To hear your family tell it you were half human and half Loa. The Loa were deities and spirits associated with the practice of Voodoo. The reason you have Levaeu blood in your veins was that long ago the madam performed a ritual that summoned a rather handsome spirit to her.

Needless to say Marie Levaeu had had trouble finding a date due to her reputation...and a woman has needs after all. So she was impregnated (after a night of pleasure) by the Loa. She gave birth to a half-Loa child, and centuries and many offspring later...here you were.

Life was normal for you at Yokai Academy...well..as normal as it could be. That changed when you bumped into a purple haired girl sucking on a lollypop. You both fell as you were in a hurry to get to class, though the girl seemed to not be in the same hurry.

"Aw shit, sorry about that!" You said as you stepped over to her and offered your hand to help her up. "Are you okay?"

Mizore opened her eyes after wincing from the impact...and saw quite the handsome sight. "I...I'm ok..." Mizore said in her quiet voice.

"Wow...she's cute..." Was what went through your head.

Her eyes were wide and she had a blush slowly appearing on her cheeks. "Aw man, you dropped your sucker...sorry about that." You apologized as you reached into your backpack and pulled out a bag of them.

"Here...you can have whichever flavor you like!" You said cheerfully.

That sealed the deal for Mizore.
11.title: Mizore Shirayuki

choices: You are stopped by some of some bullies
You make it to class, with Mizore silently in tow
111.content:
"Uh... thanks." She says while taking one from your bag. "I-I should go." She says before taking off.

That was kinda weird, even if she was pretty cute. You think to yourself as you dust yourself off and keep walking down the path. Unknown to you however, you'd grown a purple-haired shadow, as your new friend had taken it upon herself to follow you after hiding behind a tree.

"I might not know your name, but you intrigue me. Could you possibly be the one? I must know more about you." She says to herself as she proceeds to follow you, silently gliding from tree to tree.

*****

As you approach the main building, you can't help but feel a chill. It was as if someone was watching you, but you couldn't tell where they were. It didn't matter, though. You were still late for class and needed to hurry.

You broke into a sprint once more as you went inside. Mizore was right behind you, slipping in through the barely open door you left behind.

What happens next?
111.title: Mizore Has a new Target to Stalk!

1111.content:
Unfortunately, you bumped RIGHT in to a group of thuggish bullies who were standing there...convenient. "Ow, not again!" You grunted, before you felt your collar gripped and were face to face with Saizo Komiya.

"You owe me money, punk!" The orc student growled. "What are you talking about?" You asked, surprisingly not afraid. "You just bumped into me..I think I deserve some compensation. Right boys?" Saizo asked his two cronies, who chuckled and nodded dumbly.

"Ugh," You rolled your eyes, no one taking notice of the snow woman peeking around the lockers. "I don't have time for this...I'm almost late for class!"

"Oh no, wouldn't want the loser to be late now would we?" Saizo mocked before shoving you into the wall. "You gonna pay up? Or does this have to get ugly?" Saizo cracked his knuckles.

"Funny...I thought we were already at the ugly part, since you showed up." You smirked. Mizore had to stifle a giggle, she didn't want to give up her stalker spot!

"Why you..! I'll teach you to disrespect me!" Rearing his fist back, the bully prepared to deal a punch to your face. Mizore was about to discreetly intervene..but it seemed she wasn't needed. A strange 'tear' in the air between you and Saizo swallowed the oncoming fist. Another 'tear' opened up next to Saizo's head, the fist came out of this new one and slammed into Saizo's face.

Mizore was impressed, what exactly was your monster power....to be able to get bullies to hit themselves? Saizo fell to the floor, his arm returned to its normal place and the tears in the air closed.

"WAaaAh....W-what just happened?" Saizo asked in his dazed state. You proceeded to hop over him and pushed past his two cronies, headed to class.

You arrived at class just as the bell rang. "Well...better than than never I suppose-meow!" Ms. Nekonome cheerfully said.

"Where's Mizore?" Moka asked, only for the stalker snow girl to emerge from the ceiling and plop into her desk.

"Sheesh...how many secret stalker holes do you have?" Kurumu groaned, rather creeped out.

"A stalker never reveals her secrets." Mizore calmly replied, her eyes focused on you as you took your seat and class began.
1111.title: Bullies!!

choices: You start to return to your room
You remember that you start remedial math tutoring today
11111.content:
All throughout class, you felt that same chilling gaze from before borring into you. It was as if someone's gaze was burning a hole in your head. But whenever you shifted your gaze to try and tell who it was, everyone's eyes were locked on the front of the room. Then the weird feeling returned once you got back to paying attention.

With class finally over, you stand up out of your seat and prepare to leave with everyone else, only for Ms. Nekonome to stop you on the way out. "Excuse me Mr. Ambrosine, may I have a word with you?" She asks.

"Uhhh.... sure ma'am." You stutter back.

"Don't call me ma'am-meow! That makes it sound like I'm old." She says with a hint of panic. "Ahem, as I was saying. You have a lot of nerve today. First you are only on time by seconds, then you decide to ignore my lessons and look around the room."

"S-sorry ma... Ms. Nekonome. I just had this weird feeling, like I was being watched." You try and defend.

"Well apparently you were being watched, by me-ow. Look, I'll let you off with a warning this time, but please try to not let this happen again, okay?" She asks.

"Sure. Of course. Thank you Ms. Nekonome. See ya." You say as you rush out of the room.

Well, that was a bullet dodged right there. Well, now you have the rest of the day free. But, your shadow had regrown the moment you left the room, as Mizore resumes her watching from before. Her stares during class taught her nothing about you, but she was puzzled as she watched someone with the power you showed earlier being so easily compliant to a teacher. She needed to know more.

What's first for today?
11111.title: A Weird Day

choices: Share The Louisiana Goodness with Mizore!
Kurumu and the Others Come Over
111111.content:
You entered the lunch room with your lunch box, clearly excited and stomach growling. Mizore sat down with her lunch tray silently at the table you just took a seat at. "Oh! H-hi...it's you." You blinked at the silent snow woman.

Mizore nodded quietly, her blank stare never leaving you. Across the aisle, Yukari was looking over. "Do we know that guy? Mizore I didn't think was the type to make any new friends."

Kurumu grinned and clung to Tsukune, "Yahoo! One down, two to go! Then you'll be all mine, Tsukune!" The busty girl exclaimed as she deliberately rubbed her side-boob against the blushing boy's arm.

Moka sighed as she took a sip of her tomato-juice, "Maybe she's found a boyfriend?"

The busy succubus burst out laughing, "No way!"

Mizore blushed as she never broke eye contact with you, studying you as she took a sip of her milk carton.

"God...she's cute...but why's she staring at me?" You thought as you looked back down to your unopened lunch box.

Deciding your appetite was more important to focus on right now, you opened the lunchbox and a steaming pile of what appeared to be crimson and very dead tiny mini-lobsters burst forth.

"Uhhhh....what's that?" Yukari asked as she and her friends were staring at the strange 'food' practically bursting out of your lunchbox.

To their horror, you picked up one of the tiny crawdads and pinched its tail off. Everyone stared as you started to suck the head of the thing. Kurumu looked pale and rather sickly. "I think I just lost my appetite." She queasily said.

Mizore however, looked curious as you popped a morsel of meat from the detached tail and ate it.

"I'm glad my mom sent me this...her crawfish recipe is the best." You said to no one in particular.

"Can I try one?" Mizore asked quietly.
111111.title: A Lesson in Cajun Cuisine

choices: You take it as a gift and dig in
Leave it be, at least for now
1111111.content:
"Uhhh... sure." You say as you take out a crawfish and hand it to her. "Just make sure you crack open the shell first. Otherwise you'll break your teeth on it."

Heeding your advice, Mizore pinched off the tail like she watched you do. With the meat now exposed, she brings it up to her mouth and slurps up the tender insides. Her onlooking friends feel themselves nearly vomit at the sight. "That looks just as wrong as it did the first time." Kurumu says.

With a slight moan of satisfaction, Mizore put down the empty shell and looked at you. "Not bad." She says before getting up to leave. "Thank you for sharing"

"Wait, can you at least tell me your..." She was gone. "...name." You finish as you return to your food. Jeez, that's twice now she's pulled that little dissappearing act on you in one day. This was getting really freaky now. But your worries are put aside in favor of food at the moment as you continue to scarf down your food.

You then notice something you didn't lay out. It looked like... curry? But, something seemed off about it. Did it belong to that girl? If so, did she forget about it, or was it in exchange for giving her a crawdad? Maybe you should try and find her to return it. Then again, if it was a gift, it would seem pretty rude to just give it back to her, even if you could find her.

What do you do?
1111111.title: Sharing the Home Cooking

choices: Mizore Gets so Excited She Gets Caught Staring
11111111.content:
You decide it must be a gift, since it was laid out in a plate and all. But, it still was unlike any curry you'd ever seen. It appeared to be a normal thick curry on one side with potatoes and meat and of course the chocolate. But on the other side appeared to be...shaved ice?

"Well....I guess I should try it." You pulled the plate of curry over next to your overflowing lunchbox. Unknown to you, Mizore was seated back over next to Kurumu.

"Uhhh...? Can I help you?" Kurumu asked as Mizore was leaned down, peeking around the side of the succubus' extreme bust.

"I'm watching someone, I left him some curry and I want to see his reaction." Mizore quietly said, needless to say she was always kind of soft toned, but it seemed like she was being quieter than usual.

"Sheesh, Mizore...If I didn't know any better I'd say you got a new love interest." Yukari said jokingly. This caused the snow-woman's face to blush.

"OOoooh, so I guess you've finally given up on Tsukune huh?" Kurumu sassed as she struck a sexy pose with her boobs thrust out.

"Don't move!" Mizore forced Kurumu back into the position she was in.

"Hehe, so what's his name?" Moka asked with a chuckle.

"Dwayne Ambrosine." Mizore informed them as her gaze never left you, as you took a bite of the curry.

Your eyes widened and you closed your eyes to enjoy the exquisite taste. "Mmm...it's so good!"
11111111.title: A Chilled Gift

choices: You make it back to your room safe
You have another run-in with Saizo on the way
You bump into Miss Kagome along the way
111111111.content:
You scarfed down the rest of the curry like you had just been starved for the past week. You were amazed at how the chilled ice was somehow able to perfectly mix together without thowing off the other. It didn't take long for the plate she left behind to be clear.

Mizore smiled as she watched on as you wolfed down her food. Her friends stared at her questioningly. "Hey Mizore, why don't you just go back over and talk to him? It's clear that you're interested." Kurumu asks.

"Not yet. I'm trying to learn more about him to be sure it's meant to be." The snow woman answers. "He interests me."

"Okay... so what do you know so far?" Yukari asks.

"Well, I know we share interests in candy tastes. He likes my cooking, apparently, and he's strong." Mizore lists off.

"How strong?" Tsukune asks. "Like, when Moka removes her rosary strong?"

"I can't say for sure. But whatever monster he is, he has the power to turn an attack back at the user somehow. I watched him do it when Saizo and his thugs jumped him in the halls." She explains.

"Woah. Wonder what he could be to do something like that." Kurumu wondered as she turned to see you return to your crawfish. "Probably not from anywhere near civilization if his tastes are anything to go by." She says sickly as you slurp down the next one.

*****

With your lunchbox as empty as the plate, you take both and begin to head out of the cafeteria. "Now's your chance Mizo...re?" Kurumu started only to see that the snow woman has vanished. "How does she do that?"

Meanwhile, you had left the room, with Mizore ghosting you once more. Well, I have nothing else to do today, might as well head back to my room and catch some midday sleep. You think to yourself.

What happens next?
111111111.title: Lunch Ends

choices: Mizore and the Others Watch as You Kick His Ass!
1111111112.content:
You walked the long way to the dorms, you had a lot to think about so you walked through the forest. A few other students walked past you, seemed you weren't the only one who wanted a walk.

Unaware of your snow woman tail, you wandered through the trees until you were ambushed by Saizo! "Gagh!" You cried out as you were knocked against a tree.

Mizore observed as Saizo pinned you against a tree, if you were as strong as she thought..she might not need to step in. Besides that, she was curious what your monster form was like.

"Alright, punk..I don't know what fancy trick you pulled earlier, but it ain't helping you now!" Saizo's two lackeys grabbed you by either arm as the bully in question morphed into his orc form.

Kurumu, Moka and Tsukune came upon the scene with Mizore peeking out from the tree at the situation. "Wow, he must've pissed Saizo off bad." A student who was watching said.

"What's going on?" Moka said worriedly.

"Those assholes from earlier ambushed him." Mizore had gripped the side of the tree and it started to freeze in her anger.

"Should we help him?" Kurumu asked curiously.

"I wonder what his monster form is like." Yukari said, approaching them. "When'd you get here?" Kurumu asked teasingly.

"I've been here the whole time!! Don't pretend like you didn't see me!" Yukari yelled angrily.

As Saizo's long orc tongue slithered out of his mouth, a crowd has begun to gather. "You must be pretty unpopular, a lot of folks've showed up to see you get pounded!" Saizo cackled.

"I'm telling you right now...you do NOT want this fight." You warned the bully dangerously.

"Bwahahahahaha! This ain't gonna be a fight! You can drop the tough guy act! This is gonna be a slaughter!" Saizo mocked before his two cronies began to feel uneasy. "Uh..what's going on...?" One of them said as a strange aura began to surround you.

Your eyes glowed green and an orange energy surrounded you as your monster form was revealed to all.

Two large upward curled horns appeared on the sides of your head. Above your forehead was a sort of goat skull that came down so its jaw was above your eyes. The top of your face turned ghostly white as the skin there made the shape of a skull on your face.

Your hair became long dreads and your clothes morphed so that your shoulders were adorned in a sort of fur. Across your arms there were strange tribal markings, and your palms glowed as wisps of orange energy came off of them.

"What the hell?! What kind of monster are you?!" Saizo demanded.

"Congratulations, you've just pissed off a Loa." You sneered at the bully.
1111111112.title: Power Revealed

choices: You continue on with your shadow in tow
Mizore's friends push her up in front of you
11111111121.content:
"A what?" Saizo asks tauntingly as he pretends to clean his ear like he hadn't heard you. You really hated when the people of this country did things like that.

"A Loa." Yukari says to her friends. "Not much is known about them, since they're supposedly rare, even in the region they come from. They are voodoo spirits that come from the few areas of the Americas where that's practiced. Physically, their strength isn't that much higher than ogres, but they make up for it with insane mystical powers. Or at least, so they say."

"Woah!" Her friends awe.

"Since your hearing seems to be faulty, how about I just show you instead?" You suggest. You break your arms free from his goons' grip before you grip their faces with one hand each. With a glow of your hands and a muffled scream from each of them, they go limp as you release your grip and let them flop to the ground.

"Wha?! What did you do to them?!" Saizo asks with a panic.

"Don't worry, they'll live. They'll have a hell of a headache when they wake up, but they'll live." You affirm. "Now, on to you."

You raise a glowing hand, and with a flick of the wrist, you send Saizo flying into a tree, where he crumples to the ground, but still conscious. "What the hell?" He gasps as the wind is knocked out of him.

You then open two tears, one on either side of him. "Ha, I know this trick now. I'm not about to punch blindly like last time and hit myself." He scoffs.

"That's fine. I don't need you to." You remark as you move the tears, making them swallow his fists and forearms. "I can do all the work myself."

You open a third tear in front of his face and watch as a fist flies out of it, knocking him in the jaw. While it was retracting into the tear, a fourth one opened, sending another fist square into his chest. At blinding speeds, you open and close tears in front of him, pummeling him in a barrage of his own fists. Then, with one final blow, you launch him through the tree and halfway into the wall behind him.

With the fight concluded, you turn back to your normal look as you dust yourself off. You recollect your things and prepare to head off once more.

What happens next?
11111111121.title: A Down Home Beatdown

choices: You Two Talk On the Way to the Dorms!
TimeSkip..Perhaps to the Day of the Date?
111111111212.content:
Mizore suddenly felt everyone's hands on her back as she was being pushed forward. "W-wait!" Mizore yelped as she tried to dig her heels into the ground. "Not a chance!" Yukari refused.

"Yeah! Enough stalking, confess your feelings already!" Kurumu grinned, but her inner thoughts were more like "With the stalker out of the way..that'l just leave Moka and Yukari!"

As you turned around to head towards the dorms, you found yourself face to face with the curry girl from earlier. "Oh, hiya! When did you get here?" You blink in confusion as you didn't see her around the area.

Mizore pushed her fingers together and her cheeks flushed as she spoke quieter than usual. "W-well...I...uh...was wondering if...."

Moka, Tsukune and the others were peering out from the tree. "Damn! She's blowing it!" Kurumu facepalmed.

"Huh? Can you speak up a little bit?" You ask, genuinely unable to hear her mumbling.

"If....if you'd like to go out with me?!" Mizore blurts out all in one breath.

A seemingly endless silence followed, during which your face turned scarlet. "Well...I'd love to! But I don't even know your name."

Mizore gasped, flustered. "O-Oh of course it's Mizore Shirayuki!"

"Dwayne Ambrosine. By the way, that curry you left was delicious! You're a really good cook!" You compliment her.
111111111212.title: A SnowWoman's Confession of Love

choices: Mizore decides to ghost you once more
1111111112121.content:
You watch as the red on her face goes even deeper at your compliment. "Th-thank you." She whispers into her hand as you two begin to walk. "I hoped you would when I left it."

As you both left, her friends that pushed her into this seemed a bit proud at their work. "I hope things work out with them." Moka says with the others agreement before the three ladies dogpile Tsukune once more.

*****

You both walked through the woods back to your dorm room, but you quickly found Mizore dragging behind as if she were deliberately trying to stay out of your sight. "Are you okay Mizore? If you're embarrassed to be seen with me, you can just say so." You tell her, making her snap up and close back in to you.

"N-no! It's not that at all! I'm just not used to being in the open at all. I usually like watching from afar." She says.

"I see..." You trail off with a bit of a raised eyebrow. "Wait... have you been watching me since we bumped into each other earlier?" You ask.

"Y-yeah. I'm sorry. I just wanted to learn more about you before I said anything to you. You're not mad at me, are you?" She asks.

"No, you're fine. I was just curious because I've been sensing a set of eyes on me all day, and now I know why." You tell her. "But for future reference, if you want to know more about me, you can just ask."

"R-right." She mumbles. "So, what's it like being a... Loa, right?"

"Right, but I'm more of a half Loa rather than the real deal like my ancestor. I'm technically half human, but there's enough monster in my blood that the school made an exception." You explain.

"Woah." Is all she can say as she recalls the 'fight' she saw earlier where you tossed Saizo around like a ragdoll without even touching him. She then wondered that if that was the power of a half Loa, then what would a pureblooded Loa be able to do?

"Well, seeing how you already saw what I am, what about you? What's your monster form?" You ask.

"I'm a snow woman. I can create and control ice and snow." She tells you.

"So the ice in that curry was..." You lead on.

"Created by me, yes." She answers as you both continue your walk.

What happens next?
1111111112121.title: An Introductory Walk

choices: Focus On Kurumu and Yukari...Perhaps They Help Mizore Get Ready for Tomorrow?
11111111121211.content:
You two talked and got to know each other so much that you were at the dorms before you knew it. "Wow...I guess we're here." You said sheepishly. Mizore nodded, her blush still apparent.

"So um...do you maybe want to grab some lunch tomorrow? It's Saturday so...no classes." You suggest, noticing her shyness.

"S-sure...that sounds nice." She quietly responds. You gulp nervously, it was now or never you supposed. "Hey um...Mizore?"

She looks up at you with those blue eyes of hers, you feel a bit hot under the collar. "I uh...I like you...so um...have a good night, okay?" You quickly give the snow woman a kiss on the cheek and practically sprint up to your room.

The snow woman is at a loss for words, she feels the area of her cheek where your lips touched. It was..."Warm..."

-----------

You panted as you flopped on your bed after undressing. "I can't believe I did it...I kissed her. I hope she doesn't take offense or thinks its moving too fast..." You lay there, staring at the ceiling as you lose yourself in your thoughts. You had a date! A cute one! And one who clearly was interested in you...so you think at least. I mean..who stalks someone they're not interested in?

You slowly feel sleep take over you and lose yourself in dreams about your new girlfriend.

----------

Mizore was staring up at the boys dorms, she could see your light was still on and she'd actually seen the silhouette of you undressing. She would've stayed there all night...if it wasn't for Kurumu and Yukari showing up.

"Yahoohoo! How'd it go?!" Kurumu asked cheerfully.

"Well...he...asked me out to lunch for tomorrow..." Mizore shyly said. "Wow! That's so nice!" Yukari cheered.

"And....he gave me a goodnight kiss." Mizore flushed and hid her face in her hands.
11111111121211.title: Saying Goodnight

choices: A seductive outfit of Kurumu's choosing
111111111212112.content:
"Oooo. Looks like he's already interested." Kurumu coos at the snow woman's admission. "You're coming with me. I'm gonna teach you everything you need to know about how to keep those hooks in him." She says while dragging her friend away.

"Wait..." Is all Mizore says before simply accepting this fate. Yukari, on the other hand, couldn't keep up with her friend while she was like this. She instead decided to head back at her own pace, hoping Kurumu doesn't teach anything too bad to Mizore.

*****

You wake up with a stretch and a yawn before standing up to start the day. As you walk around your room, you accidentally kick your lunch box. "Oh yeah, I almost forgot." You say to yourself as you throw on the bare minimum. You just hope she's awake right now. Oh who am I kidding, of course she is. You think to yourself as you open a tear in your room.

"Allo? Who's 'der?" You hear a familiar voice on the other side say.

"Hi mama." You say as the picture comes through to show your mother back home in Louisiana in her kitchen. One of the best parts of being part Loa was these pseudo-portals that made phones look like a joke.

"Oh hey 'der baby. How was school yesterday? Did ya like the crawdads I made ya?" She asks.

"They were delicious mama. I was actually hoping you could make me another helping like that for lunch today if you don't mind." You ask her.

"Of course baby. Just toss your box over and I'll have it filled with the Bayou's bounty in two shakes." She says. You do as instructed and throw your lunchbox into the portal where she catches it on the other end. You were confused, however, by the raised brow she had when she opened it. "What's with this plate? I don't remember sending 'dem last daddies on a plate."

Oh shit! You forgot that you left the plate from Mizore's curry in your lunchbox. Well, no getting around it now that she knows. "Actually mama, that was a gift from someone else. I was gonna wash it for her and give it back today." You tell her.

Her ears pricked up at the word "her". "What's 'dis now? My baby boy's got himself a girl? What's her name? What's she like? When can I expect grandkids?" She fires off.

You blush a bit at her questioning. "No mama, it's not like that. I just met her yesterday and I have a picnic lunch planned today. I figured that since she liked the one crawdad I shared yesterday, that she'd like more, is all." You explain.

"I getcha. Well then, if my baby needs a picnic to please his new lady friend, then mama's got you covered." She slides your tiny lunchbox aside and pulls out a much larger basket. "This gal about to get a real cajun meal."

She then puts in another large serving of crawfish, a few beignets, and a small pot of gumbo. "That'll do it." She says with pride before handing the basket back through.

"Mama, it's only two people eating lunch. We aren't serving the whole school." You argue.

"Nonsense. Y'all need to eat, and this lady needs to learn the taste of the south. Don't worry bout your lady friend's plate, I'll have it cleaned by tomorrow. Have fun now baby." She says before closing up your portal. Well, looks like you're bringing all this now. You notice that it's getting close to lunch time as you wonder how late you slept in. You quickly throw on your uniform and sling the basket of food onto your back before heading out.

*****

You find a nice, secluded spot in the middle of the woods to set up. It only now dawned on you, however, that you never told her a spot to meet or anything. You hope she can find you before this stuff got cold. Then again, from your understanding, it seems like she's got a tracking chip on you, so it shouldn't take too long for her to find you.

You hear the sound of a stick breaking behind a tree. "Mizore? Is that you?" You call out.

As expected, you see the snow woman's head poke out from around the tree. "Hey." She says.

"I wasn't sure if you would find me. Come on. Let's eat before this gets cold." With a bit of hesitation, you watch as Mizore steps around the tree wearing...
111111111212112.title: Preparations

choices: Things Get a Bit More Romantic
Some Students Affiliated with Saizo Interrupt!
1111111112121121.content:
You were somewhat relieved that the snow-woman was just wearing her normal outfit. At least now you wouldn't feel bad about not dressing fancy. "You look good...just like always..." That last part left your lips before you had time to process it. You blush as Mizore looks startled but her cheeks redden also.

"T-thank you...you do too." She takes a seat right next to you under the shade of the trees. You start pulling the food out of the basket, seeing Mizore's eyes grow wide at the assortment. "Uh...sorry, my ma kinda overdid it. N-Not that I can't cook but it was kinda...short notice." You stammer.

Mizore smiled a little, she looked so cute when she smiled. "I'm sure it tastes great, did your mother cook those crawfish yesterday?" She asked.

"Yeah...she did. I didn't think you knew what they were, the others seemed to not know what I was eating hehe..." You said sheepishly.

"I paid attention and did some research on the cuisine where you're from." Mizore said quietly as you put some gumbo on her plate along with a side of the crawfish.

"My mama is washing that plate you used for the curry, I hope you don't mind." You said as you took a bite of crawfish.

"I don't mind, it saves me an extra dish to clean..." Mizore informed you as she copied the method you had shown her yesterday for eating crawfish.

The date continued in this sort of casual yet somewhat awkward way until...
1111111112121121.title: No Need to Get Dressed Up

choices: You heal and your powers return
They start to get free, but you still can't fight
11111111121211212.content:
You had just finished off the crawdads and were just about to bust out the gumbo pot. "Hope you're ready. This is one of my ma's specialties." You boast

"I can't wait." She says while you pull out a bowl and removed the lid to the gumbo pot. You both took a deep inhale as the smell rises out. "Smells tasty."

"Just wait until you actually try it." You say as you begin to scoop some out of the mix. "You love i-...." You start before you feel something smack into the back of your head, making you collapse to the ground.

"Dwayne!" Mizore cries out as she checks if you're still breathing.

"I'm fine. Something must've pegged me in the head. I can't feel my powers, though." You tell her. "Can't move too well either."

You're interrupted by cackling from the trees. With Mizore's help turning your head, you see the two goons that were working with Saizo yesterday. "Look at the big, bad voodoo spirit flat on his face." One says.

"Yeah, he ain't so tough without his little glow power." His friend adds.

"You two? Didn't get enough from last time, huh?" You comment.

"That's what you think, but it looks like you ain't going to give us another thrashing." The first one says. "Now then, let's give him a little karma." He says to his buddy. They then turn into their monster forms, with one becoming an oni and the other a banshee.

You can't move or even call on your Loa powers. That blow to the head must've severed your brain's connection to them temporarily. You were completely defenseless. You close your eyes in fearful anticipation of what was to come.

Then, you hear a sharp crack and the laughter stopped. You then feel a cool sensation where you were hit. Opening your eyes, you see both thugs encased in a thick mass of ice. You shift your gaze a bit to see Mizore holding a piece of ice to you.

"Mizore? Did you just...?" You trail off. Her light smile tells you all you need to know.

What happens next?
11111111121211212.title: Round 2

111111111212112121.content:
You felt your powers surge to life once more as you stand up, Mizore worriedly looking over you. "I'm alright...I feel a lot better..thanks to you." You say, causing Mizore to flush red once more.

You both gaze longingly into each other's eyes.

"Dwayne...."

"Mizore..."

"Dwaaayne...."

"Oh, Mizore..."

Kurumu and Yukari were peeking out of their hiding spot, decked out in camouflage to blend in with the shrubs. "Oh jeez, they're doing that thing..." Kurumu groaned.

"What thing..?" Yukari questioned.

"That thing Moka and Tsukune always do!" Kurumu fumed. "That whole, 'oh Tsukune' 'oh Moka!' thing! It's so corny!" Kurumu stuck her tongue out after her imitation of Moka and Tsukune.

Yukari sweat dropped, "Jealous he won't do that with you?"

"Oh shut up!" Kurumu yanked Yukari down as they both went back into 'shrub mode'.

Suddenly the ice prison encasing the two assholes cracks open. The shivering banshee and oni glare at Mizore and you. "Crap! Loverboy got his powers back!"

"Doesn't matter, we know how to weaken him now! Just wack him on the head!"

"Yeah, and after that we'll take the snow chick back to our dorm room for some fun!" The two dorks chuckled dumbly. Mizore proceeds to freeze them once more.

"You know...why don't we find a better spot? This one has some kind of pest problem." You joke, getting the shy girl to crack a smile.
111111111212112121.title: A Dynamic Duo!

1111111112121121211.content:
"Let's go." You say as you open a tear above you, which soon comes down and swallows you both and your spread. This came to the dismay of your two spectators.

"Aw man, and it was just getting good too before those creeps showed up and ruined everything. Now we have no idea where they went." Kurumu huffs as she jumps out of bush and throws ber shrub disguise on the ground.

"Oh well. We should probably give them some alone time anyway. They earned it after that." Yukari admits.

"Yeah, you're probably right." Kurumu sighs in defeat. She then takes notice of the two thawing thugs that caused this begins to get free again. "Buuttt... nothing saying we can't take out a little frustration, right?" She asks as she cracks her knuckles and pops out her wings.

"That sounds about right." Yukari agrees as she readies her wand towards the two, now panicking as they realize the situation they awoke to. "Let's get 'em!"

"AAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!"

*****

Meanwhile, you had opened yhe other tear to a rooftop on the main building. Mizore quickly takes notice of the scenery. "Going from a picnic in the woods to a rooftop view, huh?" She comments as she sits back down.

"Yeah, figured that from here those two won't have any chance of catching up until we've finished eating." You tell her as you sit next to her and resume pouring out gumbo.

"So, about what happened with your powers. Is it really as simple as a blow to the head to takr them away?" She asks.

"Not exactly. It seems like those guys just got lucky. They hit my head in just such a way that my spine couldn't carry signals to my body, and by extension my powers, for a minute or so." You explain. With a bowl full, you hand it to her. "As I was saying, try some, you'll love it."

What happens next?
1111111112121121211.title: Going Elsewhere

choices: Kurumu and Yukari...Perhaps the Other Two...Have Found You and are Peeping
You and Mizore Wrap Things Up
11111111121211212111.content:
Time passed rather quickly as you both enjoyed each other's company. Mizore enjoyed the gumbo, just as you thought she would.

The more you talked the more you grew fond of her, she was lonely and she'd been all alone for so long..until Tsukune and the others came along.

You gently placed your hand over hers, she looked up and into your eyes as she was at first taking off guard. But then her face softened and she smiled a bit with a blush. "So are you um..enjoying yourself?" You ask her quietly.

Mizore nodded, "Of course, I'm having so much fun." Mizore replied happily.

"So um...what's your story? I mean, I know you're half human and all." Mizore asked curiously.

"Yeah, it's cause of my great ancestor, you might've heard of her cause she's pretty famous around where I live. She was called Marie Levaeu. She was a powerful voodoo priestess that a lot of people were afraid of. So she had to summon a Loa to basically...y'know...secure her bloodline."

Mizore blushed but asked the obvious question, "She...summoned a spirit to have sex with?"

You chuckled sheepishly, "Yeah...it's weird I know but she was probably really lonely and wanted a family."

Mizore looked down slightly, "I...can understand that, being all alone gets old."

You noticed her looking a little sad so you reached over and gently cupped your hand on her cheek. "It's okay, you'll never be alone anymore."

Mizore's eyes widened and tears began to form in her eyes. "T-thank you...I'm so happy that you're here."

Slowly, you both leaned in, and your lips touched.
11111111121211212111.title: Finally Alone

choices: She vanishes into one of her stalker spots
111111111212112121111.content:
After you and Mizore have your kiss, you begin to pack up your things to head back. Meanwhile, two figures poke their heads through the crack of the door up to the roof. "Yahoo! Looks like she's got him Yukari!" Kurumu silently cheers.

"Oh gag me!" One of the thugs shouts from lower down the stairway, only to be answered by a washtub landing on his head. "Ow!"

"Keep quiet or we just might." Yukari snaps down at their two bound captives. After thoroughly beating the pair in the forest, Kurumu took to the air to find you both to resume watching. It took her some time, but she was able to spot you both on the roof without being noticed.

Not wanting another interruption, they decided it best to tie up the two and bring them along. They had just gotten up here to spot your kiss, no matter how quick it was. "Okay, okay, I'm sorry." He says before silencing himself again as the two girls resumed watching.

"Warm." Is all Mizore could say after that quick peck.

"Uh... right." You say as you sling the basket on your back once more. "Thanks for doing this with me. I had a lot of fun."

"No, I should be thanking you. You've warmed me in ways I've never felt before." She says back.

"That could just be the cajun. It tends to do that to people." You joke. "So, about getting down. Do you want to just head down the stairs, or would you rather the express way?" You ask with a glowing hand raised, ready to open a tear.

What does she choose?
111111111212112121111.title: The Spectators Catch Up

1111111112121121211111.content:
"I think i'd rather take the long way." Mizore said and clung to your arm lovingly. "Hehehe, fine with me."

Kurumu and Yukari paled and stumbled over themselves, and their hostages, in an effort to escape the approaching couple. Unfortunately, they ended up falling all over one another in a pile. "Owww..." Kurumu groaned as the door opened.

"Huh? Who are these folks? Aren't they your friends? ...Well...other than the two tied up jackasses." You deadpanned.

Mizore sighed as she stepped forward, "And you say I'M the stalker." The snowwoman quipped.

"W-we weren't stalking! We were just..making sure everything went okay!" Yukari defended.

"Yeah! What she said!" Kurumu agreed, hearing a slight pervy chuckle coming from beneath her chest.

"Hehehehehe...so sooooft..." One of the bullies chuckled with a nosebleed.

"Eww! Get away!" Kurumu shoved the pervert away from her mounds.

"Hey there, I didn't get to talk to you the other day. But I'm glad Mizore has friends who would spy on her to watch out for her!" You said.

Kurumu and Yukari weren't sure whether they were offended at the accusation of spying...or if they were glad to get to know Mizore's boyfriend.

"Well...yeah! We gotta look out for each other y'know!" Kurumu said with determination. Yukari nodded, "Yep!

What happens next..?
1111111112121121211111.title: Eavesdroppers Discovered!

choices: You both leave them to their fighting
Mizore vanishes, leaving you to deal with this
11111111121211212111111.content:
"Uh huh. Well then, I suppose you both could walk with us, if you want." You suggest. As nice as it would be to meet some of Mizore's friends in person, this was your first quote-unquote date with her, and you'd much rather it be only her for now.

But you had the feeling that they were going to follow you around whether you let them or not. "Cool. Let's go then. I'm Kurumu, by the way. The blue-haired girl says.

"Yukari, nice to meet you. Uhhh, should we do something about these two before we go?" The small witch asks, pointing down to their captives.

"I think I have just the thing in mind for them. Step back please." You say, causing the two to climb off of them and back up. With a grin on your face, you open a tear beneath them, swallowing the two.

"Where'd you send them?" Kurumu asks once the deed was done.

"Swimming club. I figures those two could have some fun there..." You comment.

*****

A tear opened above the school pool as your former agressors fell from the sky and landed in the water. While they were still tied together, their combined legs were able to keep them afloat. "Bastard. He better watch his back when we cross paths again." The one says.

"Yeah. Just wait. We know his weakness now, and we'll be ready next time." His buddy says.

"Ahem." A throat clear got their attention to the blue-haired beauty in the pool with them as they noticed that they were surrounded by girls. "How nice of you to join us boys." She says before her and the others opened their gills and gave the two hungry looks.

"AAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!!!"

*****

"So you're a succubus, Kurumu?" You ask as you all walk through the woods once more.

"Yup. Expert of all things sex and seduction." She brags.

"More like expert on knowing how to swing your stupidly huge chest around." Yukari mumbles.

"What was that flatty? I couldn't hear you down there." The succubus snaps back before the two start going at it.

"Does this happen often?" You ask Mizore as you both watch on.

"More than you would imagine." She answers.

What happens next?
11111111121211212111111.title: Getting to Know Mizore's Friends

choices: You Two Keep Flirting as You Walk Around Campus
Switch to the others (Moka/Tsukune or Kurunu/Yukari)
111111111212112121111111.content:
You give each other a look as if to say 'Lets bail on them', nodding to each other you skedaddle. This left the squabbling succubus and witch to each other's company.

"Now look what you've done! You scared them off!" Kurumu yelled. "ME?! You're the one who-" Yukari's retort was drowned out by Kurumu's enormous boobs being mushed in her face aggressively.

*************************

As you both continued to walk through the halls, you felt a cold hand slip into yours. You blushed as you glanced over and saw a slight rosiness to Mizore's cheeks as she avoided your gaze. "Well...might as well make it official y'know?" She quietly said.

You gulped as you felt your heart beating faster. "Hope you're okay with it moving so fast..." You murmured.

"Hey, I've been stalking you for awhile. Pretty sure you're the one, and besides with Tsukune it was only within a day that I...well..thought I was in love with him." Mizore looked down at the floor.

"But already we're farther along than things were with Tsukune and me. He seems to have eyes only for Moka." Mizore said rather disappointingly.

"I hope I'm not being looked at as a downgrade..." You joked. Mizore smiled, "Not at all." the snow woman lay her head against your shoulder.
111111111212112121111111.title: A Nice Walk

choices: It's time for the date to end
She asks you to open a tear to your mother as proof
1111111112121121211111111.content:
"Careful with that head. You don't want to give me the cold shoulder, do you?" You joke with a wobbly smirk while she just looks confused. "Sorry, thought that would be a good ice breaker." You try again, this time getting a small giggle out of her.

"How original." She retorts as she rests her head back down on you. "Did you think those up yourself or get them from my father?"

"Sorry. I'm kinda new to this 'dating' thing, and I've usually been alone apart from my folks. I'm still working on doing small talk." You admit.

"You're doing fine. Just keep being like this and you'll be okay." She comforts. "So I have a question about those portals of yours."

"My tears? What about them?" You ask.

"Does it mean you can just go anywhere you want instantly? Or is there some kind of catch?" She asks. "If not, then you could very well be the ultimate stalker."

"Well, not exactly. My tears usually require one of two things. Either direct line of sight to where they are going, or memorization of the place I'm sending it. For example, I can open one up to my mama's kitchen from anywhere in the world, but if I wanted to say, warp to class, I couldn't do it without risking someone getting hurt by the tear opening inside them." You explain. "As for the stalking part, I learned the hard way that a giant glowing portal in the ceiling isn't very conspicuous." You say while recalling to your middle school days when you opened a tear in the girls' locker room, only for them to immediately spot it and you.

"Oh well, easy come easy go." She comments.

What happens next?
1111111112121121211111111.title: A Nice Walk Continued

choices: You Get Mizore's Plate Back and Close The Tear!
Your Pet Boa Slithers Out to Say Hello
11111111121211212111111112.content:
"But....I kind of want so see proof." Mizore asked as she finally takes her head off your shoulder and looks at you sternly.

"Um...right now?" You ask rather nervous about being put on the spot like this. As if they popped up out of nowhere, Kurumu and Yukari come into frame. "Yup! Right here, right now...open up a portal to your house or something!" Kurumu demands.

"You're just wanting to snoop and be nosy..." Yukari murmured.
Before they started to argue, a chilling breeze got them to stop. "Shhhh...I wanna see this. Yeah, your house sounds good."

"Well...I DO have to give this pot and stuff back to mama." You admit.

Yukari and Kurumu chime in: "D'awwww! You call her mama!"

That chilling wind blew Kurumu and Yukari again. The commotion of course caused Moka and Tsukune to wander over, after they finally had some private time together...since Kurumu and Yukari were distracted by you two lovebirds.

"What's going on? Did the date go well?" Moka inquired curiously.

"It sure did, in fact..my new boyfriend is going to demonstrate one of his amazing powers to open portals right now." Mizore boasted.
"Wow really?" Tsukune asked in amazement.You kind of had an audience now, you just hoped to heaven that your mom didn't embarrass you.

You opened a portal to your home and your mother was seen with her back turned to the 'tear'.

She was wielding a ladle and smacking the BIGGEST lobster any of your new friends had ever seen. The enormous crustacean was trying to climb out of a huge pot of boiling water and seasonings and peppers.

"Get back in 'dere! Get back in 'dat pot!" She was yelling at the lobster as she smacked it. Kurumu paled as she saw several snakes hanging from the cupboards and spice racks...just chilling out.

"Uh...ma?" You say, finally getting her attention. "Oooh sweetie! How did your date g-Oh my goodness mah baby has him all sortsa lovely women surrounding him don't he?!" The brown skinned woman swooned.

You blush as everyone else does too, "N-no mama! This is her!" You point at the only girl in the group with purple hair.

"Ooooh! Ain't you just 'da sweetest 'ting? I hope you give me lots of grandbabies!" She just comes out and says it.

"M-MOM!" You yelp out as you quickly hand her the borrowed pot.
11111111121211212111111112.title: Meeting the Cajun Mama

choices: Your mom tosses the plate through and closes the portal with Ray still with you
Much to his disappointment, you put Ray back home
111111111212112121111111122.content:
"Alright sweetie, I know when ya don' wanna talk to me." Your mom says as she takes the cookingwear through the tear. "Dang! Ya'll two done licked this stuff clean."

"Your cooking is wonderful, ma'am." Mizore says with a bow.

"Well thank ye. Looks like ma baby found himself a gal with some manners!" She shouts back while smacking the lobster back into the pot. "Dern thing. I don't think I got yer name little lady."

"Mizore Shirayuki, ma'am." She says without breaking her bow.

"Nice to meet ya. Ma boy gave me your plate to wash up. Just give me a sec and I'll go get it." She says before walking away, leaving the tear open.

"Well... your mom's certainly... eccentric." Tsukune say with a sweatdrop.

"If by eccentric, you mean crazy." Kurumu mumbles before another cold wind blows up her skirt. As she was looking down, though, she saw something that made her go pale. "Uh, guys... something's coming through."

You all follow her gaze to see a six foot long boa slither its way through the portal. Everyone except you and Mizore began to panic as it finishes coming through. Yukari prepares a spell while Kurumu extended her claws. Moka and Tsukune backed away.

Meanwhile Mizore seemed unphased given what she's seen you do. You on the other hand, couldn't be happier. "Ray!" You yell as you bend down to let the serpent slither up your arm and around your neck before nuzzling against your cheek.

"You know this snake Dwayne?" Tsukune asks as he and Moka steadily reapproach. Yukari and Kurumu look like they're on the verge of fainting.

"Guys, this is my pet boa, Raymond, or Ray for short. He's been my best friend since I was a kid." You tell them. "Ain't that right, buddy?" At your question, the snake nuzzles you once more before licking your cheek with his serpent tongue.

"Can I hold him?" Mizore asks to her friends' shock.

"Uh... sure, go ahead. He's completely docile and would never hurt anyone unless provoked." You tell her as you reach for her hand and let him slide across and onto her. To your surprise, he took to her quick.

Sure, he's usually friendly with people, but he was already rubbing his head against hers in affection. "I think he likes me." She says with a soft smile.

"I guess the cold-blooded are attracted to each other." Kurumu comments before being hit with another chilled breeze.

"Anyone else wanna hold him while we wait?" You ask, to the immediate head shakes 'no' from the others. "Suit yourselves, then."

What happens next?
111111111212112121111111122.title: Reunion With Ray

1111111112121121211111111221.content:
You hear shouts from the portal and see that the gargantuan lobster is scuttling out of the pot and onto the counter. Your mother tosses the plate to you and the portal is snapped shut.

There was a stunned silence before Moka says: "Um...didn't your mom forget something?"

"Or did she not see him?" Tsukune adds.

The big boa is resting on Mizore's shoulders, plain as day.

"Well...I can just open up the portal again and send him back through. No problem!" You reassure them. That was when Ray perks up and leans his head over to stare directly into your eyes.

You look into those reptilian beads and see sadness. You weren't really apart for long until you headed off to Yokai Academy. The day you set out it was a tearful farewell but you reassured him you could come back to visit.

You hadn't visited yet but you'd only been here less than a month. It must've felt pretty long for your slithery buddy.

"I don't think he wants to go home...he wants to stay with you." Mizore said softly.

"Guess you two understand each other after all..." Kurumu snarked before a freezing wind blew at her.

"Is that right, buddy? You wanna stay?" You ask the snake as you pet him on the head. The snake to everyone's astonishment, seems to nod.

"Well...I guess he's staying."

"WHAAAAAAT?!" Everyone besides you and Mizore yell.

"What? He's friendly..." You shrug.

"What about the teachers? Do you REALLY think they'll allow you to keep a SNAKE?" Tsukune tries to reason.

"The teachers around here don't seem to give that much of a shit about anything..." Mizore acknowledges.

"Well..she's got a point." Yukari hums in thought.
1111111112121121211111111221.title: New Slithery Student

11111111121211212111111112211.content:
"Besides, as long as he keeps on his best behavior, I don't think anyone will mind." You add. "Think you can do that bud?" The snake nods in response to your question. "There, see? No proble..."

"Hey!" A voice shouts out to make you stop talking. You all turn to face a red-headed girl with twin ponytails glaring down your group. You had no idea who she was, but the others (sans Mizore) seemed terrified of her.

"And you are...?" You ask, only for Mizore to tap your shoulder and motion you closer.

"That's Kokoa Shuzen. Moka's little sister and a vampire like her. She hates anyone weaker than her, meaning all of us and Moka. She wants her real big sister back." She whispers into your ear.

"Real big sister?" You question.

"See the rosary on Moka's neck?" She asks with you nodding once you notice. "Once that's removed, the Moka you see now vanishes and is replaced by another Moka. One more powerful and dominant. The only way to get this Moka back after that is to put the rosary back on."

"I see." You say as you turn back to the redhead. "Okay miss Shuzen, what can I do you for?"

"You can start by getting out of my way while I get my big sis back. Or you can stand there and get squashed like all these other wimps." She orders.

"Or, choice three, you get out of here before things get ugly." You retort.

"Oh really? You wanna play that game? Then let's play. Ko-buddy, let's do this." She says as if talking to someone and stretching out her hand, only for nothing to come from either. "Ko-buddy?"

You all hear muffled yells behind her as you all look to see Ray, now with a noticeable bulge in his stomach. You turn to see that in the commotion, he had slid off Mizore's neck for a snack. "Mistress Kokoa, help me wheeee." You hear from inside him.

"That snake ate Ko-buddy! You bastard!" Kokoa yells as she makes a dive for your scaled friend, only for you to stop her with a barrier.

"Calm down. Let me handle him." You say as you walk past her and kneel beside him. "Ray, you ate someone else's friend. Can you please spit him out?"

With a reluctant look, Ray begins the process of spitting out his meal, a strange-looking bat. "Hey, I resent that comment wheeee." The bat says as if talking to someone. "Sorry miss Kokoa, but if that thing's here, then I'm not wheeee." It says before flying off.

"You coward." Kokoa says before realizing that she was all alone now.

"So, still want to fight me without your little friend?" You ask.
11111111121211212111111112211.title: A Rude Interruption

choices: You Agree to Join The Newspaper Club..But Have to Pass an 'Initiation'
111111111212112121111111122112.content:
"Damn it! You'll pay for this!" Kokoa yells over her shoulder, already heading for the hills. You blink, "Well...that was quick."
"Yahoo!! You saved us!" Kurumu 'glomps' you.

"I've never seen anyone stand up to her like that before.." Tsukune admits. Moka looks rather worried, "I hope she'll be okay..."

"You were great too!" Yukari crouches down and complimented the snake. You chuckle before a freezing wind chills Kurumu to the bone as she was currently still hugging you. "Alright, alright! I'll let go! Sheesh!" Kurumu yelled as she released you.

Mizore quickly clung to your arm, "Dwayne is mine."

"Hehehe...guess I'm taken." You say sheepishly.

Yukari was stroking Ray's head with a big smile on her face. "You wanna thank him for saving us too, Kurumu?" Yukari cheekily asks her rival.

"Uhh...thanks I think I'll pass..." Kurumu said nervously and waves her hands.

After that, you and Ray seemed to become part of the little clique as it were. You practically spent the rest of the weekend together, until finally it was Sunday and you were all hanging out together.

"Hey I just thought of something! We should ask Dwayne to join the Newspaper Club!" Yukari cheerfully proclaims.

You blink in confusion, "The what club?"

"It's the club where we work on the school's newspaper!" Moka explains.

"I didn't even know the school had a newspaper." You say bluntly, causing the entire group to look dejected with a storm cloud over their heads.
111111111212112121111111122112.title: Newfound Popularity

choices: Reveal yourself to her. No secrets
Stay hidden and wait her out
1111111112121121211111111221121.content:
"I think that's a great idea Yukari." Kurumu says to everyone's surprise. Not because she didn't like you, they were just shocked at her agreeing with the young witch. "But I think he has to pass a little 'initiation' after that little comment."

"What do you mean Kurumu?" Yukari asks while petting Ray. While she was reviled by him at first, after his part in saving them, she quickly warmed up to the little guy, even if he preferred you and Mizore to anyone else. "No one else had to do any sort of initiation, so why should he?"

"Because, I'm in the mood for some fun. Come with me Dwayne. I'll tell you what you'll be doing once we're alone." She says before walking away, only to be stopped by a strong ice wind.

"Kurumu..." Mizore says with a lot of anger in her voice. "If you do anything funny with him..."

"Relax snow queen, I won't touch him. Besides, even if I tried, he's strong enough to stop me if he wanted to." She retorts. Seeing her point, Mizore sits back down, but still keeps her icy glare on the succubus as she leads you away.

"Are we really gonna let her do this?" Tsukune asks the others once your both gone. "She doesn't really speak for the club, we can still let him in even if he fails her test."

"Of course we can." Moka answers. "But as long as it's harmless, let's just let Kurumu have her fun."

*****

Once Kurumu has you in private, she turns to face you. "Okay, here's your test. I want you to do a panty raid, and I want you to raid a very specific room." She tells you.

"K-Kurumu?! What the hell?! You remember that Mizore's my girlfriend now, right? I can't just go snooping in another girl's room and stealing her underwear." You yell in a whisper.

"Then you better not get caught then, huh?" She asks before writing on a piece of paper and handing it to you. "Here's the dorm room you'll be raiding. Sneak in tonight and grab a pair of her underwear, then bring them to me tomorrow. Otherwise, no club for you." With that, she turns to leave and walks away, leaving you wondering how you got in this mess.

*****

After a little recon, you figure out which room is the one Kurumu wants you to go in from the outside. Night soon fell and you decided to make your move. Whoever this is, her light hasn't come on yet, meaning she still hasn't come back.

This was your chance. Using a tear, you get up to her window and use your new visibility to open another tear inside the room. You use this one to walk right in. You found the dresser and quickly check drawers for the one you want.

Then you found your mark. A drawer full of panties. You decide on a rather plain pair of white ones before closing the drawer. Before you can tear out of their, though. You hear the door open and the light click on. Luckily for you, the dresser blocked you from sight of the doorway for now.

Then you heard a familiar voice. "Such a fun day with him. Wish I knew where he went after Kurumu took him away." Crap! This was Mizore's room?! Kurumu must've set you up. You tuck yourself in a corner, hoping she still hasn't noticed you while you plan your next move.
1111111112121121211111111221121.title: Kurumu's "Initiation" For You

choices: You'd Better Go Get The Poor Fella Outta There...
You Decide He Can Sleep In There For the Night...Payback!
11111111121211212111111112211211.content:

That was when the realization hit you like a ton of bricks. I never even picked a time or place to meet her. How am I supposed to date her if we never even said where to meet?! You think to yourself.

Sighing in defeat a bit at the missed opportunity to date such a cute girl, you resign yourself to loneliness for the day and begin to make your way back to your dorm room. On your way, you passed by the girl's dorm, where a familiar voice called out to you. "Hey Shinro, up here!" The voice says.

You look up to see Kurumu leaning out of a window on one of the higher floors. "I was just getting ready to come find you. Wait right there and I'll be right down." She calls out before ducking inside.

Soon enough, Kurumu was outside the building jogging towards you. "Hey, sorry I took so long. Wanted to clean up a bit before our date." She says.
